titles.title: Congratulating the 2002 United States Olympic Team, Salt Lake City, the State of Utah, the Salt Lake Organizing Committee, the International Olympic Committee, athletes from around the world, and all the security personnel who participated in the 2002 Olympic Winter Games in Salt Lake City, Utah.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 3/6/2002--Introduced. Extends the House of Representative's heartiest congratulations to the members of the 2002 U.S. Olympic Team, its coaches, and officials for a job well done, and congratulates Salt Lake City, the State of Utah, the Salt Lake Organizing Committee, the International Olympic Committee, athletes from around the world, various security agencies, and the people of the Salt Lake City area for their immensely successful efforts in organizing and carrying out the 2002 Olympic Winter Games.
